title: trader ladycrown
author: trader ladycrown
content: Hello Trying to make my first positive topic here Maybe am new here but am a crypto trader since 2019 so am trying to share my ALT List for da upcoming bull season/cyclei expect at least 10x from every coin of them let me share them wiz u KDA ALGO OG ID C98 ONE ATOM CRO GALA DODOFET STX SUI ARB DOT APT MAGIC SOL AVAX LTC GRT KMD CFX HNT MATIC INJ ROSE FTM FIROZRXDENTWAXP MANASANDDYDX WAVESJOEam not talking about memes or shit coins Also am high focuser especially on APT DODOTOMO ATOM GRT C98 ONE DYDXFIROmaybe that will help new investors or whom looking for a long term trip nor profit all of that coins i already studied their projects , circulating supply , total supply if you compare its intial market cap , volume you will found in recent there is a good chance for at least x10 in every single coin of themlooking forward to hear back from u about ur upcoming bull list and if you have any notice about any of my coins feel free to comment wiz ur point of view

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: trader ladycrown on May 19, 2023, 05:36:57 AM-cut-maybe that will help new investors or whom looking for a long term trip nor profit all of that coins i already studied their projects , circulating supply , total supply if you compare its intial market cap , volume you will found in recent there is a good chance for at least x10 in every single coin of them-cut-Well, in my eyes you are that new investor as you started crypto in 2019 and haven't been part of any real bull market yet. So i am interested on what are your insights on choosing those almost 40 coins and what makes you think they all of them will be a part of next bull run? Have you read their whitepapers and how about their competition? Reason for 0x can't really be the marketcap alone. Otherwise you could pick just random low caps and say that they are rising next bull run because of it. And volume can and is being constantly faked.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: That's a lot that you've got in your list but isn't it that most of them have already their own ATH before? As we all know or if others still don't know, most of these alts that have reached their peak already. They're the ones that has hard time into reaching another peak or all time high. But if that's what you think that shall bring you 10x of profit on the next bull run.Then, it's a good luck to everybody who holds it and we shall see if you'll be accurate then.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: trader ladycrown on May 19, 2023, 05:36:57 AMi expect at least 10x from every coin of them Expect at least 10x of every coin/token on the list? Don't make a joke here, mate. That's ok for the low token price projects on your list, but what about Litecoin (LTC), Aptos (APT), Polkadot (DOT), Solana (SOL) and Avalanche (AVAX)?It's improbable that the coins I mentioned will gain at least 10x in the upcoming bullrun. They are big project coins that have got a big market cap as well. I doubt your experience that you said you have been trading since 2019.  Hmmm...

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Are you talking in usd or in sats?  I mean if bitcoin runs 10x then yeah it's not that hard for these to run too since most trade off of the btc pairing.  What's really interesting is people who can predict coins that will outpace bitcoin by 10x.  That's a true measure of if a coin/project is booming.

comments.author: davide72
comments.body: I would be very careful about all the projects listed by you many of which are long dead, then many will not reach new ATH.... Be careful do not be fooled by the possibility of easy earnings

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: davide72 on May 19, 2023, 08:56:44 PMI would be very careful about all the projects listed by you many of which are long dead, then many will not reach new ATH.... Be careful do not be fooled by the possibility of easy earningsHave to agree on this one, on his priority list I didn’t see any good coins that can potentially pump in the next cycle of bull run so I also suggest the same thing, be careful on dealing with them and make sure you do analyze well to avoid losing more money. The market is down today, this is the best time to accumulate good coins, better to look at the top coins rather than taking risk with the small projects.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: You can hope that your altcoins can increase in the next altcoin season, but you must understand that not all altcoins can increase. It's good if you have studied their projects so you can see the opportunities of each coin.There are a few coins I don't know about, especially the new ones, but hopefully the new ones do have a good chance of going high. We all hope that the coins we have can provide benefits, but we must know that the competition between altcoins will be increasingly fierce, making us more careful to look for them. And once you're confident about the coins, you should be able to hold on to them and maybe buy some more when the price drops.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: davide72 on May 19, 2023, 08:56:44 PMI would be very careful about all the projects listed by you many of which are long dead, then many will not reach new ATH.... Be careful do not be fooled by the possibility of easy earningsThat's the same thoughts as mine. I want to know how much OP has invested on each of them, maybe they're just like $50-$100 and that's it suggesting these, all of it to everybody as if they'll reach 10x soon.Be careful with your choice because you'll not know if all of them are going to be as good as they are. It's good to have lesser coins in your portfolio but they're the best performing assets than to have a bunch of them but most of them you're unsure if they'll perform well or not.
